tool_description: JP Funda API is an API that provides fundamental information based on the securities report data of Japanese companies in Json format.
name: JP Funda
title: JP Funda

api_list.name: getListByEdinetCode
api_list.description:
### Return all securities report data of the company specified with edinet code.
Note: If the company doesn't have a consolidated subsidiary, all of consolidated management indicators become null.　But you can obtain data instead of consolidated management indicators from non consolidated management indicators
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://jp-funda.p.rapidapi.com/edinet_code/list/E02142"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "jp-funda.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://jp-funda.p.rapidapi.com/edinet_code/list/{edinet_code}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "jp-funda.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: getListBySecuritiesCode
api_list.description:

Note: If  the company doesn't  have a consolidated subsidiary,  all of consolidated management indicators become null.　But you can obtain data instead of consolidated management indicators from non consolidated management indicators

        }

api_list.name: getDisclosedToday
api_list.description:
### Return securities report data disclosed today
Note: If the company doesn't have a consolidated subsidiary, all of consolidated management indicators become null.　But you can obtain data instead of consolidated management indicators from non consolidated management indicators
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://jp-funda.p.rapidapi.com/today/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "jp-funda.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: getDisclosedWeek
api_list.description:

api_list.name: getDisclosedDateRange
api_list.description:
### Return securities report data Specified by the date range.
Note: This endpoint requires the 2 query parameters, start_date and end_date
Note: max date range is 31 days. if you want longer date range data, need to requesting API twice or more.
